title: Serious Question - Does Reporting AFK Even Do Anything?
body:
So the LeaverBuster system is automatic, according to the League tips that show up in the loading screen.

If that's the case, what does the action of reporting a player with a red name in the end of game screen even accomplish? Is it just there to make us feel better?

replies.body: These reports actually help a lot!  While an account can be marked by leaverbuster, these reports also help us prioritize who we look at.  As an example, they can help us tackle players who are intentionally leaving games or trying to game the system for the purpose of griefing and causing negative experiences to others.  That is something that a lower priority queue won't resolve.  Thanks for keeping the community fair!
Thank you for the swift answer. I appreciate it.
